content: the simple garter rib socks are top-down socks that feature either a 1x7 or a 1x3 garter rib the rib extends down the heel flap resulting in a cute and stylish design and a comfortable well-fitting sock size 17 5 20 22 5 cm / 7 7 75 8 75 inches foot circumference gauge 8 stitches x 11 5 row over 2 5cm 1 inch in stockinette
